name: Cyclonic Swarm Mother
description:
Daughters of the sea, their spirits and flesh corroded by the sins of Destruction, leaving only empty, distorted shells... In this life, they follow the Ocean's honed blade, not to be obliterated into nihility, but to become the tidal waves crashing against the Dark Sun.
The apocalyptic rain descends from the heavens, heralding the extinction of all things.
O Cyclonic Swarm that breeds great waves, you who have tasted the despair of your children, finally pregnant with madness.
In this burial at sea of countless stillborn souls, even tears should surge like floods, dashing hatred against the shore.

skills.name: Spurn the Abyssal Umbra
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Weeping Upon the Shore
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to one designated target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Gestation of Tempest
skills.description: Adds "Incubation" to the Action Order and applies "<u>Breeding Frenzy</u>" to this unit. When "Incubation" takes action, it uses "Parturition of Tides."

skills.name: Rain Is Born to Fall
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Parturition of Tides
skills.description: Summons "Mirage Fizzle Kid" and applies "Maelstrom's Eye" to it. If there are "Mirage Fizzle Kids" on the field, "Cyclonic Swarm Mother" will continuously use "Rain Is Born to Fall" until all "Mirage Fizzle Kids" are defeated.

skills.name: Respite By The Waters
skills.description: Advances action after taking a certain number of attacks from Basic ATK, Skill, Ultimate, or Memosprite Skill. When in the "<u>Revel in Destruction</u>" state, decreases the number of attacks required to advance action.
